name: The Square Boy
description:
The Square Boy is a platform game which your goal is to find Square's friend, Rectangle, who is lost in a strange place after partying overnight.

Controls: use the mouse in the menu and the arrow keys to play the game.

This game was made for academic purposes only. The main goal was to remake a game using Construct 2 and to make it as similar as possible to the original. As we didn't have an artist in our team, we chose to recreate an easy-looking game.

Certainly, we attempted to do some things differently. As the game couldn't exceed 100 programming events, we created a history that would last for all the levels that we created. Also, we've added a great deal of challenges at each level.

You can also play our game at Scirra Arcade where it has already achieved 237 plays by the time I'm writing this!

Thank you for playing it! :D
